title: The Rig Veda
content:
The oldest surviving Vedic text
Composed in Sanskrit, containing hymns and prayers.
Offers insights into ancient Indian culture and beliefs
image_desc: An illustration depicting ancient Indian people performing a Vedic ritual, with fire and chanting.
narration: The Rig Veda is a foundational text in Hinduism. It's the oldest surviving Vedic text, composed in Sanskrit. It contains hymns and prayers, offering insights into ancient Indian culture and beliefs.  The Rig Veda is a treasure trove of knowledge about the ancient world, providing valuable information about their rituals, social structure, and cosmology.
